> How do we know if we are on moderated or unmoderated
> status? 


Good question...  I guess only the moderators can check that... I 
guess one way would be to post a message and see if it is available 
within 1 or 2 minutes on the yahoo groups page, because it usually 
takes one of us moderators somewhere between minutes and hours 
to 'approve' a message - we have to log onto our email or the page to 
check for messages, and then approve them - we don't do this full 
time ;)

CEWest
